mapper.insert: insert into pathological_ln( person_id, unique_id, p900, patient_id, visit_id, unique_id_lv3, case_number, inspect_time, reprot_time, lymph_total, lymph_metastasis, lymph_number, positive_site, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{personId}, #{uniqueId}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{uniqueIdLv3}, #{caseNumber}, #{inspectTime}, #{reprotTime}, #{lymphTotal}, #{lymphMetastasis}, #{lymphNumber}, #{positiveSite}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update pathological_ln set person_id = #{personId}, unique_id = #{uniqueId}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, unique_id_lv3 = #{uniqueIdLv3}, case_number = #{caseNumber}, inspect_time = #{inspectTime}, reprot_time = #{reprotTime}, lymph_total = #{lymphTotal}, lymph_metastasis = #{lymphMetastasis}, lymph_number = #{lymphNumber}, positive_site = #{positiveSite}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
